@metroid Whether the "cuck" enjoys the thing or not is not what configures NTR, the conditions are pretty simple:

1- The stole partner (usually a female) is engaged in any sort of extreme and often violent sexual activities, may be part of rape/blackmail but also can happen on this partner's will.

2- The "cuck" is somehow obligated to accept the situation; Actualy it's pretty common for it to find it exciting.


That said, I dislike all sorts of NTR. It just incites the idea of doing harm for no good reason (a.k.a predatory behavior). At best you'll loose time reading a crappy story.
